conbody.p: multithreaded pipelinemonitoringmonitoringmultithreaded pipelinesWhen you monitor a multithreaded pipeline, the pipeline and stage statistics that display are for the entire pipeline, aggregated across all pipeline runners.

You can view the number of pipeline runners associated with a pipeline and the number of idle runners that are available for use. The number of pipeline runners is based on the number of threads that you configured for the origin.
